value.title: CB Insights: AI venture deals in Q2 2020 slump to lowest since 2017
value.excerpt: AI-related startups raised $7.22 billion in 458 deals In Q1 2020, down from $8.4 billion invested in 516 deals during Q1 2020.

value.title: How Reuters analyzed Rite Aid's use of facial recognition technology
value.excerpt: Reuters analyzed Rite Aid stores in America's two biggest cities to determine which received facial recognition technology and which did not. The news agency gathered this data through one or more visits by Reuters journalists to all 75 Rite Aid locations in Manhattan and the central Los Angeles metro area from October 2019 through July 2020.

value.title: Bird-identifying AI could put an end to leg bands

value.title: A New Brain-Inspired Learning Method for AI Saves Memory and Energy
value.excerpt: Rather than processing big batches of data at once, the approach simply learns from data as it becomes available, cutting the required memory and energy.
